issue.title: [Rust] Mark Array as Sync and Send
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2852](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2852). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since arrays are immutable containers, it would be safe to mark it as Sync and Send. This is useful for processing in multithread environments.
